# LLMS.txt Index

> A minimal index of all `llms-*.txt` and `llms-*.md` documents, providing a brief summary and relational links for quick navigation and contextual understanding.

---

## Beyond Numerical Metrics
> Critiques purely numerical performance metrics and introduces the Managerial Moment of Truth (MMOT) as a superior qualitative approach.
- **Link**: [llms-beyond-numerical-metrics.md](./llms-beyond-numerical-metrics.md)
- **Related**: llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md

## Claude Agent SDK v2
> A guide to the Claude Agent SDK v2, highlighting breaking changes from v1 and focusing on building autonomous AI agents with tool integration and creative orientation.
- **Link**: [llms-claude-agent-sdk-v2.md](./llms-claude-agent-sdk-v2.md)
- **Related**: llms-claude-sdk.gemini.md

## Claude Code SDK (DEPRECATED)
> A deprecated guide to the Claude Code SDK v1, emphasizing a generative, creative orientation in agent development based on structural thinking.
- **Link**: [llms-claude-sdk.gemini.md](./llms-claude-sdk.gemini.md)
- **Related**: llms-claude-agent-sdk-v2.md, llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt, llms-narrative-remixing.txt, llms-rise-framework.txt

## Claude.ai Skill Creation Guide
> A guide on how to create custom skills for Claude.ai, using the `aistudio-scaffolder` as a practical example.
- **Link**: [llms-claude-skill-creation-guide.md](./llms-claude-skill-creation-guide.md)
- **Related**: llms-txt-compliance-checklist.md

## COAIA Fuse Guidance
> A guide to using `coaia-fuse` for tracing the generative process of AI-assisted creation, framed as a narrative-driven activity.
- **Link**: [llms-coaia-fuse-guidance.md](./llms-coaia-fuse-guidance.md)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-rise-framework.txt

## CoaiAPy CLI Guide
> A manifesto and guide for the `coaiapy` Python ecosystem, framing its CLI tools as instruments for computational creativity and intelligent workflow automation.
- **Link**: [llms-coaiapy-cli-guide.md](./llms-coaiapy-cli-guide.md)
- **Related**: llms-coaiapy-mcp-config-guide.md, llms-coaia-fuse-guidance.md

## Coaiapy Langfuse Tracing Best Practices
> A standardized guide for creating rich, observable, and structurally sound traces using Langfuse, emphasizing tracing as a narrative craft.
- **Link**: [llms-coaiapy-langfuse-tracing-best-practices.md](./llms-coaiapy-langfuse-tracing-best-practices.md)
- **Related**: llms-coaiapy-cli-guide.md, llms-coaia-fuse-guidance.md, llms-txt-compliance-checklist.md

## coaiapy-mcp Configuration Guide
> A guide explaining the production and development launch configurations for the `coaiapy-mcp` server used by the Gemini CLI.
- **Link**: [llms-coaiapy-mcp-config-guide.md](./llms-coaiapy-mcp-config-guide.md)
- **Related**: llms-coaiapy-cli-guide.md

## Creative Orientation Framework
> A foundational framework distinguishing between reactive problem-solving and generative creation, based on Robert Fritz's structural dynamics.
- **Link**: [llms-creative-orientation.txt](./llms-creative-orientation.txt)
- **Related**: llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt, llms-delayed-resolution-principle.md, llms-rise-framework.txt

## Delayed Resolution Principle
> Explains the principle of holding structural tension rather than prematurely resolving it, which is critical for the creative process.
- **Link**: [llms-delayed-resolution-principle.md](./llms-delayed-resolution-principle.md)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-structural-tension-charts.txt

## Digital Decision Making Framework
> A guide for implementing the TandT (Twos and Threes) digital decision-making methodology to transform subjective analog thinking into structured binary evaluations.
- **Link**: [llms-digital-decision-making.md](./llms-digital-decision-making.md)
- **Related**: llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt, llms-structural-thinking.claude.f04dc696-3959-4be4-ad3f-390df0f517d9.txt, llms-creative-orientation.txt

## Epistemological Counter-Article Protocol
> A protocol for writing academic papers that engage in "deep disagreement" with a source's foundational assumptions about knowledge, reality, or methodology.
- **Link**: [llms-epistemological-counter-article-protocol.md](./llms-epistemological-counter-article-protocol.md)
- **Related**: llms-inquiry-6406eb37-69b1-471d-9cac-07ae69449c35.md, llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-digital-decision-making.md, llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md, llms-rise-framework.txt, llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt

## Indigenous Research Paradigm Framework
> A guide for reframing AI-assisted research to align with Indigenous paradigms, centering relationality, ceremony, and accountability.
- **Link**: [llms-inquiry-6406eb37-69b1-471d-9cac-07ae69449c35.md](./llms-inquiry-6406eb37-69b1-471d-9cac-07ae69449c35.md)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-delayed-resolution-principle.md, llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md, llms-narrative-beats.txt, llms-rise-framework.txt, llms-structural-tension-charts.txt, llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt

## Miadi GitHub Hooks Guide (Issue #115)
> A technical guide to the GitHub webhook event processing system in the Miadi project, including the ETL process and the fix for the `sub_issues` bug.
- **Link**: [llms-jgwill-miadi-issue-115-github-hooks-issues-subissues.md](./llms-jgwill-miadi-issue-115-github-hooks-issues-subissues.md)
- **Related**: llms-jgwill-miadi-issue-150-milestone.txt

## Miadi Webhook Paths (Issue #150)
> A short text with paths related to webhook milestones, world-building, and trace logs.
- **Link**: [llms-jgwill-miadi-issue-150-milestone.txt](./llms-jgwill-miadi-issue-150-milestone.txt)
- **Related**: llms-jgwill-miadi-issue-115-github-hooks-issues-subissues.md

## Leadership in Structural Dynamics
> A guide to leadership through the lens of Structural Dynamics, emphasizing structural intervention over individual will.
- **Link**: [llms-leadership.txt](./llms-leadership.txt)
- **Related**: llms-structural-tension-charts.txt, llms-creative-orientation.txt

## Managerial Moment of Truth (MMOT)
> Outlines the MMOT, a four-step process for turning discrepancies between expectation and delivery into learning opportunities.
- **Link**: [llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md](./llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-leadership.txt, llms-digital-decision-making.md, llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt, llms-structural-tension-charts.txt, llms-delayed-resolution-principle.md

## Narrative Beats Guide
> A guide on using narrative beats to document complex stories across three archetypal universes: engineer-world, ceremony-world, and story-engine-world.
- **Link**: [llms-narrative-beats.txt](./llms-narrative-beats.txt)
- **Related**: llms-structural-tension-charts.txt, llms-inquiry-6406eb37-69b1-471d-9cac-07ae69449c35.md

## Narrative Remixing Framework
> A methodology for transforming stories across different domains while preserving their core emotional architecture and structural integrity.
- **Link**: [llms-narrative-remixing.txt](./llms-narrative-remixing.txt)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-rise-framework.txt

## Non-Creative Orientation Approaches
> A brief note on "Gaps analysis" as a non-creative orientation approach and how to potentially reframe it.
- **Link**: [llms-non-creative-orientation-approach-to-convert.txt](./llms-non-creative-orientation-approach-to-convert.txt)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt

## Critique of "Supermind Ideator"
> A paradigmatic critique of an academic paper on AI for "creative problem-solving," arguing that its problem-solving bias distorts the nature of generative creativity.
- **Link**: [llms-pollution-critique-arxiv-2311.01937v1.md](./llms-pollution-critique-arxiv-2311.01937v1.md)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt, llms-indigenous-paradigm-v2.0, llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md, llms-delayed-resolution-principle.md, llms-structural-tension-charts.txt, llms-pollution-detection.md

## Academic Pollution Detection
> A short note identifying `llms-pollution-critique-arxiv-2311.01937v1.md` as an example of a new type of critique paper.
- **Link**: [llms-pollution-detection.md](./llms-pollution-detection.md)
- **Related**: llms-pollution-critique-arxiv-2311.01937v1.md

## Pythonista LLM Development Guide
> A guide for LLMs to generate creative and functional native iOS applications for the Pythonista environment, using the RISE framework.
- **Link**: [llms-pythonista-full.gemini.txt](./llms-pythonista-full.gemini.txt)
- **Related**: llms-rise-framework.txt, llms-ui-pythonista-guide.gemini.txt

## RISE Framework
> The RISE (Reverse-engineer, Intent-extract, Specify, Export) framework is a method for creative-oriented analysis and generation of code architectures.
- **Link**: [llms-rise-framework.txt](./llms-rise-framework.txt)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt, llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md

## Macrostructural Patterning Analysis (SCCP)
> A guide for using Robert Fritz's Structural Dynamics to identify and understand recurring behavioral patterns (macrostructural patterning).
- **Link**: [llms-sccp-patterning.md](./llms-sccp-patterning.md)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt

## Structural Tension Charts Guide
> A guide for understanding and using Robert Fritz's structural tension charts. Structural tension is **disequilibrium** â€” an active, loaded force that resolves through advancement (NOT "a gap to bridge"). Action steps are telescoped sub-charts, not a to-do list.
- **Link**: [llms-structural-tension-charts.txt](./llms-structural-tension-charts.txt)
- **Related**: llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-delayed-resolution-principle.md, llms-managerial-moment-of-truth.md

## Structural Thinking (Claude)
> A guide to Robert Fritz's Structural Thinking, a three-step diagnostic discipline for observing reality without preconception.
- **Link**: [llms-structural-thinking.claude.f04dc696-3959-4be4-ad3f-390df0f517d9.txt](./llms-structural-thinking.claude.f04dc696-3959-4be4-ad3f-390df0f517d9.txt)
- **Related**: llms-structural-tension-charts.txt, llms-creative-orientation.txt, llms-rise-framework.txt

## Structural Thinking (Gemini)
> A concise guide for AI on applying Robert Fritz's principles of Structural Thinking, distinguishing it from problem-solving and creative charting.
- **Link**: [llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt](./llms-structural-thinking.gemini.txt)
- **Related**: llms-structural-tension-charts.txt, llms-creative-orientation.txt

## LLMS.txt Compliance Checklist
> A checklist for ensuring `LLMS.txt` files meet standards for structure, content quality, machine readability, and AI interaction guidelines.
- **Link**: [llms-txt-compliance-checklist.md](./llms-txt-compliance-checklist.md)
- **Related**: 

## Pythonista UI Generation Guide
> A guide for LLMs on designing and generating native UIs for Pythonista on iOS, focusing on the `ui` module and `.pyui` file format.
- **Link**: [llms-ui-pythonista-guide.gemini.txt](./llms-ui-pythonista-guide.gemini.txt)
- **Related**: llms-pythonista-full.gemini.txt
